Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On July 24, 2024, JPMorgan Chase & Co. issued a press release announcing the redemption on August 1, 2024 of all of the 2,250,000 outstanding depositary shares, each representing a one-tenth interest in a share of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series FF, par value $1.00 per share and with a liquidation preference of $10,000 (the “Series FF Preferred Stock”), pursuant to the optional redemption provisions in the documents governing such depositary shares and the Series FF Preferred Stock. A copy of the press release referenced above is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.

subsections.security_redeemed: All of the 2,250,000 outstanding depositary shares, each representing a one-tenth interest in a share of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series FF.
subsections.security_terms: Par value $1.00 per share and a liquidation preference of $10,000.
subsections.redemption_authority: Pursuant to the optional redemption provisions in the documents governing such depositary shares and the Series FF Preferred Stock.
subsections.exhibit_reference: A copy of the press release is attached as Exhibit 99.

subsections.exhibit_99: JPMorgan Chase & Co. press release dated July 24, 2024.
subsections.exhibit_101: Pursuant to Rule 406 of Regulation S-T, the cover page is formatted in Inline XBRL (Inline eXtensible Business Reporting Language).
subsections.exhibit_104: Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit 101).
